EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Virtual Care Transformation Index
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Virtual Care Transformation Index Thank you for downloading our 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index <[[https://assets.ctfassets.net/l3v9j0ltz3yi/1ZIFEHK9gacaKuKkpudqlT/d8b91641af069c0d6d01f8cecbbdd61d/4575900_VirtualCareTransformation_E-book_v1_08282023_Final2.pdf]]>. We hope you find our insights helpful. For more related content on whole-person care, please visit our Resource Center <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/]]>. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
